lines.text: [Stephen shows the sheet music from his first song to two of his friends]
Let's see where it says you wrote it!
Well, I guess it doesn't say.
Did you get much for it?
Oh, he didn't pay me anything.
Did you even get any royalties?
Listen, he's doing me a big favor just to print it - didn't charge me a cent.
Boy, how 'bout that minstrel man, Christy? Didn't he pay ya?
Certainly not. I'm proud to have him sing it.
Gee, it looks like you oughta get a little something just for thinkin' it up!
